code:
stateDiagram-v2
    [*] --> Idle
    Idle --> Loading: User clicks button
    Loading --> Success: Data loaded
    Loading --> Error: Request failed
    Success --> Loading: Refresh
    Error --> Loading: Retry
    Success --> Idle: Reset
    Error --> Idle: Reset
    
    note right of Loading
        Show spinner
        Disable buttons
    end note
    
    note right of Success
        Show data
        Hide spinner
    end note
    
    note right of Error
        Show error message
        Show retry button
    end note
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
